data.actual_result: The 2nd image doesn’t gets opened when u tap it, but instead it opens the first image (your attachment picture)
data.expected_result: The client should open the 2nd image as you want to view that
data.short_description: Sending an attachment (picture) together with a attachment link causes the app to open the first picture instead of 2nd when tapping the 2nd picture
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the app in a text channel - Choose an image with the inline image (don’t send) - Find a different image that’s been send and copy that as attachment url - Paste the copied url into chat and send - Try and tap on the 2nd image and observe the first picture being opened
